reviews.review_msg: Whoever rating her high, are you seriously kidding me? No.
I took a course with her. I didnt like her. Material is dry and class is boring.
I love Angel! Her lectures, exams and grading criteria are very clear and straightforward. I took 260 with her and now I'm taking a selected topics with her. I would definitely recommend.

Very caring prof and has clear expectations. English is not her first language but you can still understand her lectures. The assignments and exams were marked very hard by the TAs. The minimum requirements will not get you a decent grade. She marks attendance through i-clicker participation (4%). A 78% will get you a B- in this class.
